listitem.para: How long the IKE SA should last before being renegotiated from scratch. The value is sent in AUTH_LIFETIME notify in IKE_AUTH response; acceptable values as for salifetime (default is 0s, the notify will not be sent, maximum is 24h, RFC 4478 claims that values under 300s are not reasonable). Sending AUTH_LIFETIME notifies in Informational can be triggered via the ipsec whack --send-reauth command.
